root: ^What does Vincenzo mean by what he said…? Is the world becoming more dangerous?
^I might have an idea, but let’s focus on the task at hand. He’ll probably be able to explain it better than I do anyway.
^Alright, where do we go and find that creepy, owlish guy?
^Maybe he’ll be back at the corner we met him at.
^How… Did you get out alive…? I don’t see… the crown… Hmm… Heh. Heh. Interesting…
^Or… are you… hiding it? Not… sharing the spoils…?
^Heh. Heh. How selfish… Yes, how selfish… Greedy, greedy human… Even though… I helped you…
^> Archibald taps your shoulder and points his thumbs in the direction you came from.
^Running…? Guilty… Heehehe. Selfish, selfish human and ghost pair! Come back… Don’t run from me…!
